item.title: HackTheBox Mango Writeup
item.description: Mango is a medium difficulty box where with basic enumeration and some MongoDB NO-SQL Injection we can extract user passwords to log in and get user access. From there we will leverage a classic jjs privilege escalation to get root access and read the root.txt file. User We first start off with an nmap scan of the machine IP Address. Then we convert our finished scan to an html file and view it in the browser.
